shift.title: Shift
shift.description: Represents a single nursing shift available for exchange.

userId.description: The ID of the user who posted the shift.

name.description: The name of the person posting the shift.

date.description: The date of the shift in YYYY-MM-DD format.

location.description: The medical center where the shift is.

time.description: The time slot of the shift.

notes.description: Optional notes about the shift exchange.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the shift was posted.

/shifts/{shiftId}.description: Collection of all shifts available for exchange.
